scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test:coverage" "cd frontend && npm run test:coverage"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
